headline: BofA Stays Positive on McCormick (MKC) Despite Weaker Q4 Results
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) is included among the Best Low Risk Stocks for a Retirement Stock Portfolio. BofA lowered its price target on McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) to $80 from $89 on January 23. However, the firm kept a Buy rating in place. The analyst said the market reacted negatively to the earnings […]

headline: 3 Consumer Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Consumer staples stocks are solid insurance policies in frothy markets ripe for corrections. On the other hand, they usually underperform during bull runs, and this paradigm has rung true over the past six months as the sector’s -4.9% decline paled in comparison to the S&P 500’s 8.2% gain.
